mapper.select: -- 查询当前用户发布的图片详情 SELECT i.id as mid, i.content, i.imgs_url, a.id AS album_id, a.name AS album_name, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(i.update_date)*1000 AS time FROM t_img_details AS i LEFT JOIN t_album_img_relation AS r ON i.id = r.mid LEFT JOIN t_album AS a ON r.aid = a.id WHERE i.user_id = #{userId} and a.uid = #{userId} ORDER BY i.update_date DESC LIMIT ${(page-1)*limit},${limit};
